participant_1.background:
I listen to the wind howl outside my window, enjoying the cold air and the solitude.
I have a laptop because I move around a lot and need to be able to work on my computer wherever I am.
i despise sweet potatoes.
I love my cats and I'm afraid of losing them.
I watch highlights of basketball games on my phone while I eat breakfast.

participant_2.background:
I am a stay-at-home mom to my two daughters.
I have a wonderful family and they are always supportive of my music store and my love for Harry Potter.
I'm a powerlifter who loves the cold, but I'm not sure I could be a professional if I were blind
i wait tables.
the only autographs i have ever wanted are from authors.

content.text: Hi there, I am a big fan of Harry Potter.
Hey there! Me too! What's your favorite book?
I love them all, but I think Prisoner of Azkaban is my favorite. I love the time travel aspect.
That's a great book! I also love the Triwizard Tournament in Goblet of Fire.
That's a great one too! I'm a little bit biased because my favorite character, Sirius Black, is introduced in that book.
Oh yeah, he's a great character! I also love Luna Lovegood.
She's one of my favorites too! I love her unique perspective on the world.
Me too! She's so positive and optimistic.
I think we'd get along well. I also love the cold weather.
Me too! I love the snow and the feeling of being cozy inside.
Me too! I love curling up with a good book and a cup of hot chocolate on a cold winter day.
That sounds perfect! I love doing that too.
I think we're going to be friends.
